scripts.remake: bunx drizzle-kit generate:sqlite --schema ./src/database/schema.ts && bun run src/util/migrate.ts
scripts.readme-update: git add README.md && git commit -m 'Update README.md' && git push -u origin master
scripts.general-update: git add . && git commit -m 'General updates including improvements and bugfixes' && git push -u origin master
